response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000. We trust this proposal will meet your expectations and allow us to facilitate a transaction that benefits all parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
